title: Music Memobrilla
content:
okay, you may have been to a concert & got a album or t-shirt etc. signed by a band such as def leppard for example & are proud of it cos you may decide to auction it on ebay one day cos it maybe worth something anyway enough of that, start posting

now about what i brought on ebay 4 $34

[img]http://www.spunoutonline.com/images/giadevkm1b.jpg[/img]

that is the offical def leppard 87/88 tour shirt i am proud to have a piece of def leppard history but i won't get to wear it yet, i'll have 2 wait till christmas, dang, but at least i have it & i won't lose it

title: Re: Music Memobrilla
content:
Don't wear it!!! Frame it, and then it will be worth something - if you wear it, it will lose its value very quickly, and thus become worth very littleProud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society
